text: Madhubala (born Mumtaz Jehan Begum Dehlavi; 14 February 1933 â€“ 23 February 1969) was an Indian actress, producer and singer. She was known as "The Venus of Indian cinema". She is thought to be one of the most beautiful and greatest entertainers in the history of Indian cinema. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Deaths from heart disease Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Actors from New Delhi
title: Madhubala
